body.reason: Review identified that the task is incomplete. While many redundant board files were removed, several `pending_from_master_*.json` files still remain in `runtime/agent_comms/project_boards/`.
body.action_required: Please delete the remaining `pending_from_master_*.json` files from the project boards directory to fully complete the consolidation. Once done, update the task status back to COMPLETED_PENDING_REVIEW.
